items.sentence: Tom was a mean man before his daughter was born.
Are you sure you don\'t want to ask Tom to help?
Tom still drinks, but not as much as he used to.
Tom suggested that I change the lock on my door.
Tom was a little overweight when he was a child.
We postponed our departure because of the storm.
Tom is wearing a coat that\'s too large for him.
Tom isn\'t allowed to do just anything he wants.
Tom isn\'t as good at French as you think he is.
Tom doesn\'t yet know exactly when he\'ll leave.
Why don\'t you tell us what happened last night?
Can eating just vegetables help you lose weight?
Can you direct me to the nearest subway station?
Can you tell me how to get to the train station?
Can you understand the meaning of this sentence?
Could you come back here again tomorrow at 2:30?
Could you move forward so we can close the door?
Tom took a twenty dollar bill out of his pocket.
Tom understands French better than he speaks it.
Tom used to smoke two packs of cigarettes a day.
